column5: lemon-thyme vinaigrette:  5/5 -  DELICIOUS.  Plentiful of shrimp.  I love the peppery flavor of arugula and it complimented the lemon-thyme vinaigrette nicely.  The dressing was so perfect.  It's whipped
column6: so thicker than just olive oil dressings and not too acidic in flavor.  I don't usually order salads when I dine
